text: Hey Oswaldo, you should also be providing documentation to supplement your theme. The link to this documentation should be included in your submission (as a field in the submission process) and also in the themes.json file as illustrated here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes#theme-json>
FWIW, it was much faster to simply create my own sections and modules and add those to the dnd_area. Final result: <https://ovsecurity.qsa-global.com/>
<https://impulsecreative.com/support/evolve-theme|Hereâ€™s a link as an example for our documentation>
